Module com.example.proyecto3_
Package com.example.proyecto3_.model.Player

Class AbstractPlayer

java.lang.Object
com.example.proyecto3_.model.Player.AbstractPlayer
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPlayer
Direct Known Subclasses:
Player
public abstract class AbstractPlayer extends Object implements IPlayer
Abstract class that provides the basic implementation for players. Implements IPlayer and defines shared attributes and logic.
